```{r data import, cache = TRUE}
# import csvs
filenames = list.files(path = "Olist_data/", pattern="*.csv")

filepath <- paste0("Olist_data/", filenames)

data <- lapply(filepath, read.csv) #import data in list

#renaming
library(stringr)
df_names <- str_extract(filenames, '.*(?=\\.csv)')

names(data) <- df_names
```
